Package makePES

Provides the classes to calculate the potential energy surface.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GenDipolefile
    Generate a file containing the DMS data.
    GenGridfile
    Generate a file containing the property data.
    GenPotfile
    Generate a file containing the PES data.
    GrdXYZ  
    GridData
    Interface with the grid data files
    GridFileName
    Manage file name conventions in MakeGrid modules
    HOdvr
    DVR grid for harmonic oscillator wavefunction
    MakeGrid
    Generate grid potential in normal coordinates
    MakePES
    Make potential energy surface
    MakeQFF
    Make quartic force field in normal coordinates
    MCStrength
    Given the QFFData, this class provides the mode coupling strength.
    PESInputData
    (Package private) Manages the data used in MakePES
    PESInputReader
    Reads the input data from makePES.xml.
    QFFData
    Reads and provides the data of QFF.
    TaskGrid
    Task for Grid PES generation.
    Tempfile
    Super class for Tempfileh and Tempfileg.
    Tempfileg
    Transforms the gradient in Cartesian to vibrational coords, and save to temporary file.
    Tempfileh
    Transforms the gradient, Hessian in Cartesian to vibrational coords, and save to temporary file.

Package makePES Description

Provides the classes to calculate the potential energy surface.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kiyoshi Yagi
